title: Point of danger: agriculture's first line of defence
creator_contributor_role: Australian National Film Board, production company
subject_group: Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Plant diseases - Australia

description: An insight into the work of quarantine officers inspecting imports from abroad to detect plant diseases and insect pests which may bring ruin and destruction to Australian agriculture if introduced into this country.
